text.section:
Sec. 2-207. Supervision and Support.
The Office of the Chairperson of the County Commission shall provide appropriate support for the Community Relations Board. The Chairperson of the County Commission shall have the power to appoint, employ, remove and supervise such assistants, employees, and personnel as deemed necessary to provide appropriate support to the Community Relations Board, and such assistants, employees, and personnel shall serve at the will of the Chairperson of the County Commission.
